chapters.title: Chapter 49:  Court of the Sun
chapters.info: Bruan, p. 733—Clan chief of the Nakai Aiel, of the Salt Flat sept. He is massive, with sad, gray eyes. He seems almost lazy by his voice and gray eyes, but even Rhuarc considers him to be a deadly fighter and a devious tactician. In Aviendha's sixth step through the crystal columns in Rhuidean, her second trip through, Bruan is still the chief of the Nakai; he is one of the only chiefs to survive the Last Battle.
